# Import Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(SummarizedExperiment)

se <- readRDS(file.path("rawCounts", "seLUSC.rds"))
se
```

# Extract NA





```{r}

cnames <- colnames(colData(se))
cnames[grep("tobacco", cnames)]

table(se$tobacco_smoking_history_indicator)

history <- se$tobacco_smoking_history_indicator

hist_NoNA <- history[grep("^[C|L]", history)]

se_filter <- se[,colData(se)$tobacco_smoking_history_indicator %in% hist_NoNA]

se_filter$tobacco_smoking_history_indicator <- droplevels(se_filter$tobacco_smoking_history_indicator) 


se_filter

saveRDS(se_filter, file.path("results", "se_history.rds"))
```
